title: League Crash/Freezes
body: Hello everyone. This just start happening recently where my Computer will freeze in game and I would have to turn off and back on again. It only happens when I have a Voice Chat open. I also just start using my HyperX Cloud II headset if that has anything to do with it. But when I don't have any voice chat open the game won't crash. I usually use Curse or Discord the most lately.

replies.body: Okay, guys. I've come down to the Headset being the problem. I can have my Corsair headset on with Discord/Curse overlay on and the game/pc won't crash at all. Then when I hook up my cloud 2 headset and hop into game, pc freezes.

It sounds like the overlays for either of these VOIP programmes may be causing the issue. I strongly recommend disabling the overlay feature if you've had it enabled, to see if it causing the crashes to cease. Be sure to test these changes in a custom match to prevent a negative experience for everyone, in the event the crashing continues.

Let me know if anything changed.
Cool deal. I'll look into this and check back in a couple testing. Thanks!
